data.message:
Everyone should follow

I wake up not sure if I will go tomorrow if by chance I will not see the sunlight for one more day
everyone has his way and his story'm not a superhero just a man who wants to give his best for the people even being a victim of slander or things that can make me sleep, but never this will take my dreams
sometimes we do not have much to say and so we started to complain about things without remembering to thank that we are alive today
I do not know how long I will live
so do not hurt me because after I'm dead his words I will not be able to listen

Chorus
Something tells me
I should go
life is a journey
and everyone should follow
God knows when the end
something tells me
that something good will happen

people will start judging me
but their lives must be shit
for them to care about me upset
I'm simply not hurt me
and I'll be happy
then hear just what I have to say
sometimes listening is the secret for a happy day

Chorus
Something tells me
I should go
life is a journey
and everyone should follow
God knows when the end
something tells me
that something good will happen

maybe I'm doing positive music because my heart has overcome the pain your heart is feeling, you do not have to count on is alone in life his father died? It was left in the orphanage?
look on the bright side one can rewrite history and show that it can be strong
I'm doing this not for me, but for all that one day they met alone and just want something vbom a positive word

Chorus
Something tells me
I should go
life is a journey
and everyone should follow
God knows when the end
something tells me
that something good will happen

today calmer I think, the problem is not being abandoned, the problem is you think you need who abandoned you, you were left out, that's fine but you should have been chosen to continue strong fighting alone and do not get angry
nobody gives anything away for free to anyone
either way you will be charged
so just learn to fight to be strong
be proud of their victories learn from their defeats, hey boy growing up is not legal, but it is necessary, overcome the pain and anger turn it into strength and believe in you, I believe in you

Chorus
Something tells me
I should go
life is a journey
and everyone should follow
God knows when the end
something tells me
that something good will happen

replies.message: Holly M Colino I'm doing my job, unlike you do not make music and do not understand anything about the world of music, you do not know my history to judge me you do not know the shit that I went through in order to have an opinion on what I write in a music, the letter I make my way to the Marshall gostarda my idea I will be very happy because I know that my work is being seen and appreciated, I think he has suffered the same prejudice when it started differently but today it is the largest rapper alive, so do not judge a book by its cover I'm just doing my job
